;;;117    }

                  avar_bps_hndl PROC
;;;336    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;337    void avar_bps_hndl(char dev, char v, char in)
0002da  e92d4ff8          PUSH     {r3-r11,lr}
;;;338    {
0002de  4606              MOV      r6,r0
0002e0  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;339    char data[4];
;;;340    unsigned short event_ptr,lc640_adr,event_ptr_find,event_cnt;
;;;341    char avar_simbol;
;;;342    
;;;343    avar_simbol='T';
0002e2  f04f0754          MOV      r7,#0x54
;;;344    if(v==0)avar_simbol='T';
0002e6  b174              CBZ      r4,|L1.774|
;;;345    else if(v==1)avar_simbol='U';
0002e8  2c01              CMP      r4,#1
0002ea  d004              BEQ      |L1.758|
;;;346    else if(v==2)avar_simbol='u';
0002ec  2c02              CMP      r4,#2
0002ee  d005              BEQ      |L1.764|
;;;347    else if(v==3)avar_simbol='L';

;;;478     
;;;479    	event_ptr=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
0005de  4650              MOV      r0,r10
0005e0  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_int
0005e4  fa1ffb80          UXTH     r11,r0
;;;480    	event_ptr_find=event_ptr;
0005e8  465c              MOV      r4,r11
                  |L1.1514|
;;;481    	
;;;482    avar_src_hndl_lbl1: 
;;;483    
;;;484    	lc640_adr=EVENT_LOG+(event_ptr_find*32);
0005ea  eb051044          ADD      r0,r5,r4,LSL #5
0005ee  fa1ffa80          UXTH     r10,r0
;;;485    
;;;486         lc640_read_long_ptr(lc640_adr,data);
0005f2  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0005f4  4650              MOV      r0,r10
0005f6  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;487         
;;;488         if(!((data[0]=='S')&&(data[1]==dev)&&(data[2]==avar_simbol)))
0005fa  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
0005fe  2853              CMP      r0,#0x53
000600  d107              BNE      |L1.1554|
000602  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
000606  42b0              CMP      r0,r6
000608  d103              BNE      |L1.1554|
00060a  f89d0002          LDRB     r0,[sp,#2]
00060e  42b8              CMP      r0,r7
000610  d009              BEQ      |L1.1574|
                  |L1.1554|
;;;489         	{        
;;;490         	if(event_ptr_find)event_ptr_find--;
000612  b11c              CBZ      r4,|L1.1564|
000614  f1a40401          SUB      r4,r4,#1
000618  b2a4              UXTH     r4,r4
00061a  e001              B        |L1.1568|
                  |L1.1564|
;;;491         	else event_ptr_find=63;
00061c  f04f043f          MOV      r4,#0x3f
                  |L1.1568|
;;;492         	if(event_ptr_find==event_ptr)goto avar_src_hndl_end;
000620  455c              CMP      r4,r11
000622  d1e2              BNE      |L1.1514|
000624  e060              B        |L1.1768|
                  |L1.1574|
;;;493         	else goto avar_src_hndl_lbl1;
;;;494         	}
;;;495         else 
;;;496         	{
;;;497         	lc640_read_long_ptr(lc640_adr+16,data);
000626  4669              MOV      r1,sp
000628  f10a0010          ADD      r0,r10,#0x10
00062c  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;498         	if(!((data[0]=='A')&&(data[1]=='A')&&(data[2]=='A')&&(data[3]=='A')))
000630  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
000634  2841              CMP      r0,#0x41
000636  d10b              BNE      |L1.1616|
000638  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
00063c  2841              CMP      r0,#0x41
00063e  d107              BNE      |L1.1616|
000640  f89d0002          LDRB     r0,[sp,#2]
000644  2841              CMP      r0,#0x41
000646  d103              BNE      |L1.1616|
000648  f89d0003          LDRB     r0,[sp,#3]
00064c  2841              CMP      r0,#0x41
00064e  d009              BEQ      |L1.1636|
                  |L1.1616|
;;;499         		{        
;;;500         		if(event_ptr_find)event_ptr_find--;
000650  b11c              CBZ      r4,|L1.1626|
000652  f1a40401          SUB      r4,r4,#1
000656  b2a4              UXTH     r4,r4
000658  e001              B        |L1.1630|
                  |L1.1626|
;;;501             		else event_ptr_find=63;
00065a  f04f043f          MOV      r4,#0x3f
                  |L1.1630|
;;;502             		if(event_ptr_find==event_ptr)goto avar_src_hndl_end;
00065e  455c              CMP      r4,r11
000660  d1c3              BNE      |L1.1514|
000662  e041              B        |L1.1768|
                  |L1.1636|
;;;503         		else goto avar_src_hndl_lbl1;
;;;504         		}
;;;505    
;;;506         	}	
;;;507    
;;;508    
;;;509    	
;;;510    	data[0]=LPC_RTC->YEAR;
000664  f8b8003c          LDRH     r0,[r8,#0x3c]
000668  f88d0000          STRB     r0,[sp,#0]
;;;511    	data[1]=LPC_RTC->MONTH;
00066c  f8980038          LDRB     r0,[r8,#0x38]
000670  f88d0001          STRB     r0,[sp,#1]
;;;512    	data[2]=LPC_RTC->DOM;
000674  f898002c          LDRB     r0,[r8,#0x2c]
000678  f88d0002          STRB     r0,[sp,#2]
;;;513    	data[3]=0;
00067c  f88d9003          STRB     r9,[sp,#3]
;;;514    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+16,data);
000680  4669              MOV      r1,sp
000682  f10a0010          ADD      r0,r10,#0x10
000686  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr
;;;515    
;;;516    	data[0]=LPC_RTC->HOUR;
00068a  f8980028          LDRB     r0,[r8,#0x28]
00068e  f88d0000          STRB     r0,[sp,#0]
;;;517    	data[1]=LPC_RTC->MIN;
000692  f8980024          LDRB     r0,[r8,#0x24]
000696  f88d0001          STRB     r0,[sp,#1]
;;;518    	data[2]=LPC_RTC->SEC;
00069a  f8980020          LDRB     r0,[r8,#0x20]
00069e  f88d0002          STRB     r0,[sp,#2]
;;;519    	data[3]=0;
0006a2  f88d9003          STRB     r9,[sp,#3]
;;;520    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+20,data);
0006a6  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0006a8  f10a0014          ADD      r0,r10,#0x14
0006ac  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr
;;;521    	
;;;522    	data[0]='B';
0006b0  f04f0442          MOV      r4,#0x42
0006b4  f88d4000          STRB     r4,[sp,#0]
;;;523    	data[1]='B';
0006b8  f88d4001          STRB     r4,[sp,#1]
;;;524    	data[2]='B';
0006bc  f88d4002          STRB     r4,[sp,#2]
;;;525    	data[3]='B';
0006c0  f88d4003          STRB     r4,[sp,#3]
;;;526    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+24,data);
0006c4  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0006c6  f10a0018          ADD      r0,r10,#0x18
0006ca  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr
;;;527    	
;;;528    	data[0]='B';
0006ce  f88d4000          STRB     r4,[sp,#0]
;;;529    	data[1]='B';
0006d2  f88d4001          STRB     r4,[sp,#1]
;;;530    	data[2]='B';
0006d6  f88d4002          STRB     r4,[sp,#2]
;;;531    	data[3]='B';
0006da  f88d4003          STRB     r4,[sp,#3]
;;;532    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+28,data);
0006de  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0006e0  f10a001c          ADD      r0,r10,#0x1c
0006e4  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr
                  |L1.1768|
;;;533    	
;;;534    	}
;;;535    	
;;;536    avar_src_hndl_end:
;;;537    __nop();		
0006e8  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.1770|
;;;538    }
0006ea  e8bd8ff8          POP      {r3-r11,pc}
;;;539    
                          ENDP

                  avar_bat_ips_hndl PROC
;;;601    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;602    void avar_bat_ips_hndl(char in)
0006ee  e92d4ff8          PUSH     {r3-r11,lr}
;;;603    {
0006f2  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;604    char data[4];
;;;605    unsigned short event_ptr,lc640_adr,event_ptr_find,event_cnt;
;;;606    
;;;607    if(in==1)
;;;608    	{
;;;609    	bat_ips._av|=1;
0006f4  48b1              LDR      r0,|L1.2492|
;;;610        ips_bat_av_stat=1;
0006f6  4cb2              LDR      r4,|L1.2496|
;;;611    	ips_bat_av_vzvod=1;
0006f8  4bb2              LDR      r3,|L1.2500|
;;;612    
;;;613    	event_ptr=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;614    	event_ptr++;	
;;;615    	if(event_ptr>63)event_ptr=0;	
;;;616    	lc640_write_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG,event_ptr);	
;;;617    	
;;;618         event_cnt=lc640_read_int(CNT_EVENT_LOG);
;;;619    	if(event_cnt!=63)event_cnt=event_ptr;
;;;620    	lc640_write_int(CNT_EVENT_LOG,event_cnt); 
;;;621    	
;;;622    	lc640_adr=EVENT_LOG+(lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG)*32);
;;;623    	
;;;624    	data[0]='B';
;;;625    	data[1]=0;
;;;626    	data[2]='C';
;;;627    	data[3]=0;
;;;628    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr,data);
;;;629    
;;;630    	data[0]=0;
;;;631    	data[1]=0;
;;;632    	data[2]=0;
;;;633    	data[3]=0;
;;;634    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+4,data);
;;;635    
;;;636    	data[0]=LPC_RTC->YEAR;

000702  f04f0742          MOV      r7,#0x42              ;624
000706  f44f6560          MOV      r5,#0xe00             ;613
00070a  f04f0900          MOV      r9,#0                 ;615

;;;638    	data[2]=LPC_RTC->DOM;

;;;640    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+8,data);
;;;641    
;;;642    	data[0]=LPC_RTC->HOUR;
;;;643    	data[1]=LPC_RTC->MIN;
;;;644    	data[2]=LPC_RTC->SEC;

;;;646    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+12,data);
;;;647    	
;;;648    	data[0]='A';
;;;649    	data[1]='A';
;;;650    	data[2]='A';
;;;651    	data[3]='A';
;;;652    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+16,data);
;;;653

;;;655    	data[1]='A';
;;;656    	data[2]='A';
;;;657    	data[3]='A';

;;;661    	data[1]='A';
;;;662    	data[2]='A';
;;;663    	data[3]='A';

;;;667    	data[1]='A';
;;;668    	data[2]='A';
;;;669    	data[3]='A';
;;;670    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+28,data);

;;;680    	ips_bat_av_vzvod=0;

;;;681         
;;;682    	event_ptr=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
0009f0  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0009f2  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_int
0009f6  b286              UXTH     r6,r0
;;;683    	event_ptr_find=event_ptr;
0009f8  4634              MOV      r4,r6
                  |L1.2554|
;;;684    	
;;;685    avar_bat_ips_hndl_lbl1: 
;;;686    
;;;687    	lc640_adr=EVENT_LOG+(event_ptr_find*32);
0009fa  eb0a1044          ADD      r0,r10,r4,LSL #5
0009fe  b285              UXTH     r5,r0
;;;688    
;;;689         lc640_read_long_ptr(lc640_adr,data);
000a00  4669              MOV      r1,sp
000a02  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000a04  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;690         
;;;691         if(!((data[0]=='B')&&(data[1]==0)&&(data[2]=='C')))
000a08  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
000a0c  2842              CMP      r0,#0x42
000a0e  d106              BNE      |L1.2590|
000a10  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
000a14  b918              CBNZ     r0,|L1.2590|
000a16  f89d0002          LDRB     r0,[sp,#2]
000a1a  2843              CMP      r0,#0x43
000a1c  d009              BEQ      |L1.2610|
                  |L1.2590|
;;;692         	{        
;;;693         	if(event_ptr_find)event_ptr_find--;

000a20  f1a40401          SUB      r4,r4,#1
000a24  b2a4              UXTH     r4,r4
000a26  e001              B        |L1.2604|
                  |L1.2600|
;;;694         	else event_ptr_find=63;
000a28  f04f043f          MOV      r4,#0x3f
                  |L1.2604|
;;;695         	if(event_ptr_find==event_ptr)goto avar_bat_ips_hndl_end;

000a2e  d1e4              BNE      |L1.2554|
000a30  e05e              B        |L1.2800|
                  |L1.2610|
;;;696         	else goto avar_bat_ips_hndl_lbl1;
;;;697         	}
;;;698         else 
;;;699         	{
;;;700         	lc640_read_long_ptr(lc640_adr+16,data);

000a38  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;701         	if(!((data[0]=='A')&&(data[1]=='A')&&(data[2]=='A')&&(data[3]=='A')))
000a3c  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
000a40  2841              CMP      r0,#0x41
000a42  d10b              BNE      |L1.2652|
000a44  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
000a48  2841              CMP      r0,#0x41
000a4a  d107              BNE      |L1.2652|
000a4c  f89d0002          LDRB     r0,[sp,#2]
000a50  2841              CMP      r0,#0x41
000a52  d103              BNE      |L1.2652|
000a54  f89d0003          LDRB     r0,[sp,#3]
000a58  2841              CMP      r0,#0x41
000a5a  d009              BEQ      |L1.2672|
                  |L1.2652|
;;;702         		{        
;;;703         		if(event_ptr_find)event_ptr_find--;

000a5e  f1a40401          SUB      r4,r4,#1
000a62  b2a4              UXTH     r4,r4
000a64  e001              B        |L1.2666|
                  |L1.2662|
;;;704             		else event_ptr_find=63;
000a66  f04f043f          MOV      r4,#0x3f
                  |L1.2666|
;;;705             	    	if(event_ptr_find==event_ptr)goto avar_bat_ips_hndl_end;

000a6c  d1c5              BNE      |L1.2554|
000a6e  e03f              B        |L1.2800|
                  |L1.2672|
;;;706         		else goto avar_bat_ips_hndl_lbl1;
;;;707         		}
;;;708    
;;;709         	}
;;;710         		
;;;711    	data[0]=LPC_RTC->YEAR;
000a70  f8b8003c          LDRH     r0,[r8,#0x3c]
000a74  f88d0000          STRB     r0,[sp,#0]
;;;712    	data[1]=LPC_RTC->MONTH;

;;;714    	data[3]=0;
000a88  f88d9003          STRB     r9,[sp,#3]
;;;715    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+16,data);
000a8c  4669              MOV      r1,sp
000a8e  f1050010          ADD      r0,r5,#0x10
000a92  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr
;;;716    
;;;717    	data[0]=LPC_RTC->HOUR;

;;;718    	data[1]=LPC_RTC->MIN;

;;;720    	data[3]=0;

;;;721    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+20,data);
000ab2  4669              MOV      r1,sp
000ab4  f1050014          ADD      r0,r5,#0x14
000ab8  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr
;;;722    	
;;;723    	data[0]='B';
000abc  f88d7000          STRB     r7,[sp,#0]
;;;724    	data[1]='B';

;;;725    	data[2]='B';

;;;726    	data[3]='B';

;;;727    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+24,data);
000acc  4669              MOV      r1,sp
000ace  f1050018          ADD      r0,r5,#0x18
000ad2  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr
;;;728    	
;;;729    	data[0]='B';
000ad6  f88d7000          STRB     r7,[sp,#0]
;;;730    	data[1]='B';
000ada  f88d7001          STRB     r7,[sp,#1]
;;;731    	data[2]='B';
000ade  f88d7002          STRB     r7,[sp,#2]
;;;732    	data[3]='B';
000ae2  f88d7003          STRB     r7,[sp,#3]
;;;733    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+28,data);
000ae6  4669              MOV      r1,sp
000ae8  f105001c          ADD      r0,r5,#0x1c
000aec  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr
                  |L1.2800|
;;;734    	
;;;735    
;;;736    	
;;;737    	}
;;;738    	
;;;739    avar_bat_ips_hndl_end:
;;;740    __nop();		
000af0  bf00              NOP      
;;;741    }
000af2  e5fa              B        |L1.1770|
;;;742    
                          ENDP

                  avar_overload_hndl PROC
;;;746    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;747    void avar_overload_hndl(char in)
000af4  e92d43f8          PUSH     {r3-r9,lr}
;;;748    {
;;;749    
;;;750    char data[4];
;;;751    unsigned short event_ptr,lc640_adr,event_ptr_find,event_cnt;
;;;752    
;;;753    if(in==1)
;;;754    	{
;;;755    	if(overloadAvar==1)return;
000af8  4aff              LDR      r2,|L1.3832|
;;;756        
;;;757    	overloadAvar=1;
;;;758    
;;;759    	event_ptr=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;760    	event_ptr++;

;;;762    	lc640_write_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG,event_ptr);	
;;;763    	
;;;764        event_cnt=lc640_read_int(CNT_EVENT_LOG);
;;;765    	if(event_cnt!=63)event_cnt=event_ptr;
;;;766    	lc640_write_int(CNT_EVENT_LOG,event_cnt); 
;;;767    	
;;;768    	lc640_adr=EVENT_LOG+(lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG)*32);
;;;769    	
;;;770    	data[0]='O';
;;;771    	data[1]='V';
;;;772    	data[2]='L';
;;;773    	data[3]=0;
;;;774    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr,data);
;;;775    
;;;776    	data[0]=0;
;;;777    	data[1]=0;
;;;778    	data[2]=0;
;;;779    	data[3]=0;

;;;784    	data[2]=LPC_RTC->DOM;
;;;785    	data[3]=0;
;;;786    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+8,data);

;;;796    	data[2]='A';
;;;797    	data[3]='A';

;;;802    	data[2]='A';

;;;808    	data[2]='A';
;;;809    	data[3]='A';

;;;813    	data[1]='A';
;;;814    	data[2]='A';
;;;815    	data[3]='A';
;;;816    	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+28,data);

;;;818    	snmp_trap_send("System overload",5,1,2);
;;;819    
;;;820    	
;;;821    	}

;;;823    else if(in==0)

;;;885    	
;;;886    }

                  |L1.3230|

                  avar_u_out_hndl PROC
;;;888    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;889    void avar_u_out_hndl(char in,short volt)
000d60  e92d4ff3          PUSH     {r0,r1,r4-r11,lr}
;;;890    {
000d64  b081              SUB      sp,sp,#4
000d66  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;891    
;;;892    char data[4];

000d6c  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
000d6e  d07e              BEQ      |L1.3694|
;;;895    if((in==1)||(in==2))
;;;896    	{

;;;900

000fcc  f88d0001          STRB     r0,[sp,#1]            ;1007
000fd0  f8980020          LDRB     r0,[r8,#0x20]         ;1008
000fd4  f88d0002          STRB     r0,[sp,#2]            ;1008
000fd8  f88d9003          STRB     r9,[sp,#3]            ;1009
000fdc  4669              MOV      r1,sp                 ;1010
000fde  f1050014          ADD      r0,r5,#0x14           ;1010
000fe2  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr
000fe6  f88d6000          STRB     r6,[sp,#0]            ;1012
000fea  f88d7001          STRB     r7,[sp,#1]            ;1013
000fee  f04f0442          MOV      r4,#0x42              ;1014
000ff2  f88d4002          STRB     r4,[sp,#2]            ;1014
000ff6  f88d4003          STRB     r4,[sp,#3]            ;1015
000ffa  4669              MOV      r1,sp                 ;1016
000ffc  f1050018          ADD      r0,r5,#0x18           ;1016
001000  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr
001004  f88d4000          STRB     r4,[sp,#0]            ;1018
001008  f88d4001          STRB     r4,[sp,#1]            ;1019
00100c  f88d4002          STRB     r4,[sp,#2]            ;1020
001010  f88d4003          STRB     r4,[sp,#3]            ;1021
001014  4669              MOV      r1,sp                 ;1022
001016  f105001c          ADD      r0,r5,#0x1c           ;1022
00101a  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr
00101e  e784              B        |L1.3882|
;;;1026   
                          ENDP

                  avar_u_in_hndl PROC
;;;1027   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1028   void avar_u_in_hndl(char in,short volt)
001020  e92d4ff3          PUSH     {r0,r1,r4-r11,lr}
;;;1029   {
001024  b081              SUB      sp,sp,#4
001026  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;1030   
;;;1031   char data[4];
;;;1032   unsigned short event_ptr,lc640_adr,event_ptr_find,event_cnt;
;;;1033   if(uInAvar==in)return;
001028  48ff              LDR      r0,|L1.5160|
00102a  7801              LDRB     r1,[r0,#0]  ; uInAvar
00102c  42a9              CMP      r1,r5
00102e  d07e              BEQ      |L1.4398|
;;;1034   if((in==1)||(in==2))
;;;1035   	{
;;;1036   	
;;;1037       
;;;1038   	uInAvar=in;
;;;1039   
;;;1040   	event_ptr=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1041   	event_ptr++;	
;;;1042   	if(event_ptr>63)event_ptr=0;	
;;;1043   	lc640_write_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG,event_ptr);	
;;;1044   	
;;;1045       event_cnt=lc640_read_int(CNT_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1046   	if(event_cnt!=63)event_cnt=event_ptr;
;;;1047   	lc640_write_int(CNT_EVENT_LOG,event_cnt); 
;;;1048   	
;;;1049   	lc640_adr=EVENT_LOG+(lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG)*32);
;;;1050   	
;;;1051   	data[0]='V';
;;;1052   	data[1]='I';
;;;1053   	data[2]='N';
;;;1054   	data[3]=0;
;;;1055   	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr,data);
;;;1056   
;;;1057   	data[0]=*((char*)&volt);

;;;1058   	data[1]=*(((char*)&volt)+1);

;;;1060   	data[3]=0;
;;;1061   	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+4,data);

001040  f04f0900          MOV      r9,#0                 ;1042

00104a  d017              BEQ      |L1.4220|
00104c  2d02              CMP      r5,#2                 ;1034
00104e  d015              BEQ      |L1.4220|

;;;1065   	data[2]=LPC_RTC->DOM;

;;;1071   	data[2]=LPC_RTC->SEC;

;;;1076   	data[1]='A';
;;;1077   	data[2]='A';
;;;1078   	data[3]='A';
;;;1079   	lc640_write_long_ptr(lc640_adr+16,data);

;;;1083   	data[2]='A';

;;;1095   	data[2]='A';
;;;1096   	data[3]='A';

                  avar_sys_t_hndl PROC
;;;1167   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1168   void avar_sys_t_hndl(char in,short temper)
0012b4  e92d4ff3          PUSH     {r0,r1,r4-r11,lr}
;;;1169   {
0012b8  b081              SUB      sp,sp,#4
;;;1170   
;;;1171   char data[4];
;;;1172   unsigned short event_ptr,lc640_adr,event_ptr_find,event_cnt;
;;;1173   if(sysTAvar==in)return;
0012ba  495d              LDR      r1,|L1.5168|
0012bc  780a              LDRB     r2,[r1,#0]  ; sysTAvar
0012be  4282              CMP      r2,r0
0012c0  d07e              BEQ      |L1.5056|
;;;1174   if(in==1)
;;;1175   	{
;;;1176   	sysTAvar=in;
;;;1177   
;;;1178   	event_ptr=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1179   	event_ptr++;	
;;;1180   	if(event_ptr>63)event_ptr=0;	
;;;1181   	lc640_write_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG,event_ptr);	
;;;1182   	
;;;1183       event_cnt=lc640_read_int(CNT_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1184   	if(event_cnt!=63)event_cnt=event_ptr;
;;;1185   	lc640_write_int(CNT_EVENT_LOG,event_cnt); 
;;;1186   	
;;;1187   	lc640_adr=EVENT_LOG+(lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG)*32);
;;;1188   	
;;;1189   	data[0]='T';
;;;1190   	data[1]='S';
;;;1191   	data[2]='Y';
;;;1192   	data[3]='S';

                  wrk_mem_hndl PROC
;;;57     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;58     void avar_hndl(void)
000000  e92d41fc          PUSH     {r2-r8,lr}
;;;59     {
;;;60     //static unsigned avar_stat_old;
;;;61     char i;
;;;62     //unsigned avar_stat_new,avar_stat_offed;
;;;63     
;;;64     if(net_av)		SET_REG(avar_stat,1,0,1);
000004  4606              MOV      r6,r0

00000a  eb001106          ADD      r1,r0,r6,LSL #4
00000e  4845              LDR      r0,|L2.292|

;;;65     else	   			SET_REG(avar_stat,0,0,1);
000014  8be0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x1e]
000016  2805              CMP      r0,#5
000018  d37e              BCC      |L2.280|
;;;66     
;;;67     for(i=0;i<2;i++)
00001a  4843              LDR      r0,|L2.296|
00001c  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bat_u_old_cnt
;;;68     	{
;;;69     	if(bat[i]._av&1)	SET_REG(avar_stat,1,1+i,1);

00002c  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]

000034  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_int

00003e  2d3f              CMP      r5,#0x3f
000040  d901              BLS      |L2.70|
000042  f04f0500          MOV      r5,#0
                  |L2.70|

;;;72     
;;;73     for(i=0;i<12;i++)

;;;74     	{

000096  4628              MOV      r0,r5
;;;76     	else	   		SET_REG(avar_stat,0,3+i,1);

00009c  7fa0              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0x1e]
00009e  f88d0004          STRB     r0,[sp,#4]
0000a2  7fe0              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0x1f]

;;;78

0000b8  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
0000ba  1d28              ADDS     r0,r5,#4

0000d4  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr

00011a  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_write_long_ptr
                  |L2.286|
00011e  bf00              NOP

                  |L2.292|
                          DCD      bat
                  |L2.296|
                          DCD      bat_u_old_cnt
                  |L2.300|
                          DCD      0x40024020
